5C345CF54137BED2C73727A090D6DA7E: <Emphasis>Recipe hint: </>A botched potion that magically makes your mouth taste like feet.
BA55F86B4140D625C43E14B113169146: <Emphasis>Recipe hint: </>A creamy drink and a loaf that toasts...Will reset effects for this potion’s host!
96B71BB14883BA2921000F8EDDA9421E: <Emphasis>Recipe hint: </>A creamy yellow pad, and a crystal sweetly delicious...Stirred with a tool used for catching fishes!
479386684CCC435A40546094E1ABFE54: <Emphasis>Recipe hint: </>A drink to keep you fed until your lunch. Poured in a mitt that packs a punch!
9A193DD541A9AFFA676DCAA7366FDFC4: <Emphasis>Recipe hint: </>A food, a drink, both elicit purrs... A handled object that smooths the fur!
C89A74F14EAB8D83310ABE8071DF7637: <Emphasis>Recipe hint: </>A grass and fruit for feeding mares...With an implement to groom their hairs!
6013620143DB3B259D0CD8BC7AAF29BE: <Emphasis>Recipe hint: </>A sparkling stone, a liquid clear...Mixed with a stinking bulb that vampires fear!
C6E27C434E56DABDB73FF88738F1AF5A: <Emphasis>Recipe hint: </>A white oval with golden yolk betwixt…Cracked in a fizzy drink of all colors mixed!
28747F714C159864F2B5D296F169E386: <Emphasis>Recipe hint: </>Mix any drink, with a pup that pops...To grant a canine body-swap!
6CAEDA79417ADB68FFA88BA84BCFA576: <Emphasis>Recipe hint: </>Stir a caffeinated drink, cold and sugary…With a handheld canopy!
EC604C3D4B5076F39DCF64B4584C0CD7: <Emphasis>Recipe hint: </>Transmute into an acorn thief...Mix a fizzy drink and fresh green leaf!
